listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: Cancel up to 95 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 95 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable.

listing.listing_description: Serout Jenna is a beautiful luxury villa in the Palmeraie oasis near central Marrakech. Set on 900 square meters of estate amid lush palm groves, aged olive trees, and fragrant rose gardens, the villa offers the privacy of an enchanted garden within minutes of some of the finest cultural attractions, cuisine, and golf in Morocco. Expansive outdoor areas, elegant interiors adorned with extraordinary contemporary art, and fine staff including a private cook create an ideal setting for special reunions with family and friends.The neoclassical villa features a colonnaded veranda gazing out on the ample swimming pool and expansive gardens. Enjoy fresh mornings and warm afternoons bathing in the cool water and luxuriating on elegant loungers in the shade of parasols. Repair to the gazebo amid olive trees for afternoon cocktails, and gather on the veranda for alfresco lunches and soothing digestifs.Indoors, kindle a fire in the living salon and savor a fine wine before dinner; then gather in the beautiful dining room with twelve seats of burgundy velvet, dreamy medallion chandeliers, and arched doors to garden. The décor is exquisite throughout, with high, coffered ceilings, elegant furnishings, and outstanding examples of contemporary artwork from the owner's personal collection. The villa also features a massage room and traditional Hammam, as well as a library for work, study, or contemplative downtime.Each of the bedroom suites features a sumptuous queen bed and spacious ensuite bathroom. Each is designed with extraordinary care and taste to possess its own distinct character, with fabulous fabrics, rich color palettes, and tastefully bold artwork. There are three suites in the main house and three in the stand-alone guesthouse with private entrance. In the guest house, two of the suites open to the pool terrace.From the cloistered private oasis of Serout Jenna, you're less than nine kilometers to the historic heart of Marrkech, and minutes from world-class golf. Proximity to Marrakech-Menara Airport makes Serout Jenna an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Lanterns cast a glow on the red walls and brick courtyard of this traditionally inspired retreat outside Marrakech. With 20 bedrooms and a full staff, the villa feels like your own boutique hotel, filled with both classic Moroccan rugs and streamlined modern furnishings. See how the setting inspired great works of fashion at the Yves Saint Laurent Museum, 30 minutes away, and the Majorelle Garden. Sip a local spiced coffee or mint tea on the loungers and sun beds in the courtyard, cool off in the swimming pool, and serve drinks from the al-fresco wet bar along with whatever the chef prepares on the barbecue. As the stars come out over the city, climb up to the rooftop terrace, unwind in the library and hammam inside, set the mood with the integrated sound system, and share holiday snaps via Wi-Fi. Terracotta-hued walls and carved doors lead to spacious living rooms filled with a combination of modern pieces—tempting daybeds, zebra-print rugs, angular sofas—and artwork depicting traditional scenes. The fully equipped kitchen is for staff use only, but the dining area can seat parties of up to 40 friends and family members traveling together. Each of the 20 bedrooms at this luxury hideaway is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, and a fireplace. Many of the bedrooms also have their own lounge areas and open directly to the terrace, so you can fall asleep to the sound of palm fronds whispering in the breeze and feel it on your face in the mornings. This vacation rental is a 30-minute drive from the Yves Saint Laurent Museum, where you can draw inspiration from more than 1,000 works from the fashion designer’s studio, and the Majorelle Garden, the oasis whose signature blue walls sparked his creativity. Give yourself an afternoon to get lost in the medina, wandering alleyways to hidden courtyards. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

This property is truly only for VVIP Guests who want ultimate security and privacy, while also giving them access to all areas of the hotel including the pool, the spa, and the gym. Our VS' get requests for this type of product and we do not have anything similar on offer in this region.Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

listing.listing_description: An arched portico and double doors lead the way to a marble foyer at this coolly elegant Marbella home in view of the sea. Shaded and sunny outdoor living areas serve up water vistas, while sliding glass walls flood the interiors with light. From this palm-lined enclave it’s less than 10 minutes to Playa de Nagueles in the city’s Golden Mile, home to a Michelin-starred restaurant plus a beach. Get into a good book in a lounger by the swimming pool and hot tub, taking breaks to cool off or have a drink from the outdoor wet bar. Face off against friends and family across the ping-pong table, toss market finds on the barbecue, serve tapas at the al-fresco dining table, and stay out after sunset around the firepit. This vacation rental also features a home theater with a projector, indoor mini-bar, private gym, and Wi-Fi. Black metal frames the villa’s sliding glass walls for a hit of contemporary edge that’s echoed by a sleek black fireplace in the living room. A massive wooden doorway leads to a dining room with slipcovered seating for eight, and the fully equipped kitchen is a high-contrast pairing of wood and white cabinets against glossy black countertops. This luxury property has one honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, hot tub, and a balcony with a partial ocean view. The other three bedrooms have queen beds; one has ocean views and the other two overlook the gardens. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. The villa is a 9-minute drive from the Golden Mile of Spain’s Costa del Sol. While Playa de Nagueles does have a beach, it also has a hotel that was once the home of a prince, a legendary tennis club, a Michelin-starred restaurant, and a number of yachts you can reserve for the day. If it’s not a holiday without a round or two, there are four golf courses nearby where you can tee off. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa des Vents is a gorgeous Moroccan villa situated within the renowned Domaine Royal Palm, just outside the heart of historic Marrakech. The villa offers ample private grounds and exquisite interiors for savoring private time with loved-ones, while the Fairmont Royal Palm offers an extraordinary array of resort amenities, including a spa, a kids' club, restaurants, tennis courts, and the Royal Palm Golf & Country Club. Your private professional staff at the villa include a security guard and cook.The villa enjoys a lush, cloistered ambiance amid verdant gardens and olive trees, inviting you to dreamy hours under the Moroccan sky. Step into the ample swimming pool for a refreshing dip, and sunbathe on lovely chaises longues. Enjoy games of pétanque on the court as the kids play on the lawn, and gather for refreshments on the rustic veranda. Relish meals alfresco on the canopied patio, and sip tea or wine in the adjoining lounge.The open-concept interior features a salon area with an expansive sectional sofa for evening gatherings, while an elegant dining table seats twenty for privately prepared feasts. A game table is ideal for after-dinner festivities. Large windows and glass walls offer beautiful views of the gardens, and can be opened to welcome in the garden-kissed air; while the fireplace will keep you toasty on cooler nights. Staff have access to a fully equipped kitchen that includes a Nespresso machine.Each of the four bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom, safe, and direct access to the gardens or terrace. The master suite includes a queen bed, and its bathroom is equipped with a tub, shower, and dual vanity. Two of the guest suites have queen beds (one of which can be arranged as two singles), and one has a double bed.The Fairmont Royal Palm boasts some of the finest resort amenities in Morocco. Enjoy games of tennis or world-class golf; treat yourself to a relaxing spa session; and dine at one of its four restaurants. The resort's outdoor spaces can be reserved for special events. Beyond the Fairmont, you're within easy reach of the historic center of Marrakech, including the famous Medina quarter and the Majorelle Garden. Marrakech Menara Airport is just fourteen kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Les Palmiers is a superb luxury villa on the Route Amizmiz of Morocco, just outside the heart of Marrakech. Nestled on an expansive estate, the villa comprises a four-bedroom main house and a three-bedroom guesthouse, providing ample accommodations for family reunions, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. Exquisite outdoor and indoor living areas are enhanced by excellent amenities for relaxation and play, including a large swimming pool, Hammam steam bath, fitness center, and ping-pong table, while the professional staff includes a villa manager and private cook.The lush, 7000-square-meter estate invites you to dreamy days and evenings under the Moroccan sky. An ample veranda extending from the main house features an alfresco dining table and lounge, while a second table and lounge are located on the far side of the pool. Elegant chaises longues frame the sparkling water, and the expansive lawns set an enchanting scene for special ceremonies, receptions, or games in the open air.Wide glass doors open from the pool terrace and veranda to the living and dining rooms, creating a seamless, indoor/outdoor space. A gorgeous dining room with seating for ten adjoins the alfresco veranda, forming a single dining area for large parties. The cavernous living room features breathtaking ceilings, sumptuous velvet sofas, and a wood-burning fireplace for cooler evenings. A separate media room is perfect for cozy downtime and movie nights. Your private cook has a fully equipped kitchen that includes a Nespresso machine, and there is a Sonos sound system both inside the home and on the terrace.The main house features four large king suites, all with ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys its own lounge area and opens to a terrace, while the three guest suites have furnished private terraces. The separate guesthouse has two king suites and a smaller guest suite with a pair of twin-size beds—forming a perfect private abode for a family.Les Palmiers gives you extraordinary serenity and privacy while placing you within easy reach of world-class golf and the rich cultural splendors of historic Marrakech. Drive about twenty or twenty-five kilometers to reach Ryads Al Maaden Médina & Golf Resort, the old Medina quarter, the Majorelle Garden, and Marrakech-Menara Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step into a Costa del Sol home that feels straight from a decor magazine at Villa Casabel Club. Inspired by traditional Andalusian estates, this three-bedroom vacation rental is a charming getaway for a group of friends or family—or for a honeymoon-style escape. Even better, the villa is a private oasis on the grounds of the Marbella Club Resort, giving you access to luxury amenities and more.An archway covered in fuchsia bougainvillea welcomes you to the lovely grounds of this casita—and sets the stage for its quaint architecture and beautifully appointed interiors. Start each day of your holiday with coffee at the outdoor table, then shift to a lounger in the sun by the pool or a perch on the shaded section of the terrace. In the evenings, linger by the fireplace or share photos fo your stay via Wi-Fi.From its tiled roof to its arched doors and windows, Villa Casabel Club exudes traditional charm. The ambience continues in the open-concept great room, whose living and dining areas are framed by a beamed ceiling, cream-colored walls and natural-fiber area rugs. The adjacent kitchen is fully equipped and equally stylish, with retro-chic appliances and cream-colored cabinets.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to the terrace. Like the great room, the bedrooms are serene and sophisticated, thanks to neutral tones and natural textures.Guests of Villa Casabel Club are welcome to use the swimming pool and kids club at the Marbella Club Resort, and have access to the resort’s restaurants, bars and spa as well. If you’d like to explore beyond the resort, it’s a 5-minute walk to the jet-set-favorite Playa de Nagueles and a short drive to downtown Marbella, plus two golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Savor the Moroccan sun in this palatial, four-bedroom villa in the high-end Route Amizmiz district near the heart of Marrakesh. Expansive alfresco living spaces, elegant and cool interiors, and four superb bedroom suites create an ideal habit for family reunions and special occasions with friendsWhile the Fairmont Royal Palm is an incredible destination in itself, its location on the Route Amizmiz puts you within day-trip distance of central Marrakech. Spend a morning wandering the World Heritage–designated medina and browsing the souks, or an afternoon strolling the Majorelle Garden or visiting the recently opened Yves Saint Laurent Museum.

listing.listing_description: This palatial villa is secluded within a lush oasis outside Marrakech, with sweeping views of the Atlas Mountains. Virtually a resort unto itself, the villa includes a 6-bedroom main house, 4-bedroom guesthouse, superb private staff, and wide array of amenities for wellness, relaxation, and play. Drive about 15 kilometers to explore the ancient Medina neighborhood or stroll through the enchanting Menara Gardens.Albacin blends vintage Moroccan and Andalusian exteriors with superb contemporary decor and technologies. An arcaded terrace extends from the main house with an ample alfresco dining area and lounge--perfect for privately catered feasts or cups of mint tea in the cool shade. Bask in the Mediterranean sun around the pool, and sip an afternoon drink at the pool house bar. Play petanque in the yard, practice your putt on the pro-grade green, and gather on the upstairs terrace for cocktails amid panoramic vistas. Inside, the luminous main living room features double-height ceilings and a gorgeous, 2-sided fireplace. Screen a favorite movie in the cavernous cinema or enjoy a playful night in the game room. Refresh yourself in the Hammam before retreating to your sumptuous bedroom suite.The villa’s location balances serene privacy with easy access to Marrakech and some of the finest golf course and dining destinations in Morocco. Highlights of the world-class city include Yves Saint Laurent’s famous retreat, Majorelle Gardens, as well as the iconic Koutoubia Mosque. Families with kids will enjoy a day at Oasiria Marrakech Waterpark.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This palatial Moroccan villa is located within the Palmeraie, a large palm oasis on the northern edge of Marrakesh. Its prime location places you minutes of the city's heart and some of the region's finest golf courses. Enchanting alfresco terraces and dining areas, exquisite interiors, and five stunning bedrooms sleeping ten provide an ideal setting for family reunions, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. Your vacation rental includes a cook, two kitchen clerks, and a butler.The cloistered estate offers the ambiance of an enchanted garden, with lush gardens and palms enveloping an ample central terrace with twenty-five-meter swimming pool and colonnaded veranda. Savor the delicious Moroccan light and air while playing in the pool's sparkling waters and sunbathing on elegant loungers with parasols. Enjoy alfresco meals and afternoon refreshment under the pergola, and sunset cocktails on the upper-level patio with expansive oasis views. The lush lawns of these extraordinary grounds create a dreamy setting for weddings, receptions, or intimate gatherings with loved ones.The spectacular interiors include superbly designed marble floors and pillars, traditional artwork and furnishings, and ample parlors. Each parlor possesses its own character, providing a diverse but uniformly beautiful and comforting setting for parties and meals. Several wood-burning fireplaces keep the home toasty at night. The modern, gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, while the gorgeous dining room invites you to delectable meals. The traditional Hammam steam chamber of Italian marble offers delicious, therapeutic refreshment.The five bedroom suites all feature king beds, stunning ensuite bathrooms, and access to either a terrace or the gardens. Each possesses its own charms and advantages, and all provide serene privacy to individuals and couples.At Villa Alaya, you'll enjoy an exquisite balance of secluded enchantment and excellent proximity to some of Morocco's finest attractions. PalmGolf Marrakech, Golf Amelkis, and Royal Golf Marrakech are an easy drive away, while the world-class dining and architectural masterpieces of central Marrakech are just five kilometers from your door. Marrakech-Menara Airport is only eleven kilometers away, making this villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Obsidian is a spectacular coastal villa in the prestigious oceanfront suburbs of Cape Town, minutes from Clifton and Camps Bay. The towering, five-story architectural masterwork enjoys some of the finest views on the West Cape, encompassing a vast stretch of the Atlantic Ocean and the iconic peaks of Lion's Head and the Twelve Apostles. With superbly appointed interior and exterior living areas on every floor (including multiple kitchens and dining rooms), a museum-worthy modern art collection, and a talented private staff, this vacation rental is perfectly suited for family reunions or large groups of friends celebrating special occasions.The villa's fourth floor features the main living area: a luminous great room opening seamlessly to a lofty terrace with infinity pool. A fully equipped kitchen, high-end grill, and bar-style kitchen island serve the lounge and dining areas. The central salon is ideal for admiring the breathtaking sunset, while a fireplace warms your nighttime gatherings over bottles of South African wine.The third floor boasts another TV lounge, a dining table, a kitchenette, and a balcony accompanying three of the guest bedrooms. The second floor features a wonderful alfresco cooking and dining area, including a classic braai grill, and the first floor includes yet another lounge and dining table with full-service kitchen. The entrance lobby is on the ground floor, with a security gate, parking for five cars, and an elevator servicing all floors.The stunning master suite is perched on the top floor of the home, with sweeping vistas from its bedroom, bathroom, and private balcony. A fireplace and in-room bath accompany the king bed, while the ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, two walk-in showers, and two toilets. All four of the guest suites feature queen beds and ensuite bathrooms, and two enjoy balconies. These superb accommodations with plentiful living/dining areas form an ideal haven for destination wedding guests.Obsidian provides an unparalleled combination of contemporary artistry, exquisite privacy, majestic natural beauty, and easy access to some of the top attractions near Cape Town. Drive minutes to the beautiful beaches and posh towns of Camps Bay and Clifton, or visit the fabulous Victoria & Alfred Waterfront. Cape Town Airport is just twenty-five kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sublime Palais Chahar Mahal stands on two-and-a-half-acres of gorgeously landscaped estate outside Marrakech en route to the Ourika Valley. Enjoying panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains on the horizon, the spectacular grounds set the stage for alfresco enjoyment, while exquisite interiors and five fabulous bedroom suites accommodate eight guests in lavish comfort.The enchanting estate features a meditative lake and fabulous swimming pool, the latter framed by an elegant deck and four lovely pavilions housing spa and fitness facilities. Savor dreamy hours exploring the villa's gardens of rose and bougainvillea, groves of palm and jacaranda, and orchards of luscious fruit trees. Play in the sparkling pool and treat yourself to a refreshing trip to the poolside Hammam or massage room. Sip cool drinks on elegant loungers and savor sunset cocktails on the upper-floor terrace. The vast lawns, ample lounge areas, and stately symmetry of the palace's grounds create an ideal setting for weddings and other special events.Traditional arched windows open from the villa's spacious interiors, allowing the home to breath the scented air. Exquisite marble floors and columns, beautiful artwork and furnishings, and multiple fireplaces engender a warm and stylish ambiance with touches of Moroccan, Persian, and European grandeur. Enjoy cocktails in one of the parlors, delectable feasts in the dining room, and nighttime billiards games.Each of the villa's bedroom suites possesses its own name, reflecting a unique character. Silver Jasmine is on the main floor and features a king bed, doors to the terrace, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The four remaining bedrooms—Velvet Camellia, Rose Powder, Sweet Almond, and Golden Purple—occupy the upper floor, and all enjoy fireplaces, deluxe ensuite bathrooms, and access to alfresco areas with beautiful views.Beyond your private paradise, you're wonderfully situated for relishing the natural and cultural wonders of Morocco. The villa is roughly equidistant from the precious beauty of Ourika Valley in the Atlas Mountains and the architectural splendors of central Marrakech. Golfers will find themselves in heaven, with no fewer than ten outstanding golf courses within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spread over twenty-thousand square meters of lush gardens, this three-villa estate acts more like a boutique hotel. With accommodations for twenty-six, and a staff consisting of housekeepers, private cooks, a chauffeur, the Ezzahra Estate is the perfect host for a special event like a wedding, family reunion, or retreat. Located in the exclusive Palmeraie area of Marrakech, the Ezzahra Estate’s private property is just minutes from the Medina, the Atlas Mountain range, and so much more.Combining Villas Ezzahra, Azzaytouna, and Alkhozama, your large group will have an endless supply of amenities, and space. The gardens are decorated with ancient olive trees, date palms, pomegranate and orange trees. Architecturally, Ezzahra shows off its traditional elements, red clay, intricate detailing, and free-flowing open-air spaces that unify the indoor and outdoor areas. Inside, authentic Moroccan decor will inspire you. With so many different areas to explore, there’s always more to discover. The ornate native art, colorful design, and vibrant spirit of Morocco will excite you and your guests throughout your entire stay.With a staff of seventeen, laundry, meals, chauffeured trips through Marrakech, and anything else you may need are easily taken care of, allowing you and your guests to live worry free, focusing on the rejuvenating atmosphere of your Moroccan vacation. Outside on the terrace, you’ll love exploring the expertly manicured gardens, alfresco dining and living areas, fire pits, three-swimming pools, and grass tennis court. Inside, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, a media room, and exercise equipment will provide all the comforts of home.Jump right into Moroccan culture with a visit to the Square of Djemaa El-Fna and The Souks for an exciting afternoon of street performance, shopping, and delicious local cuisine. After you’ve taken part in the hustle and bustle of downtown Marrakech, head to Dar Si Said Museum to see ancient Moroccan artifacts, and learn a little more about the city’s history. And, if you need an escape from the busy city streets, head for the Majorelle Gardens and stroll through their gorgeous property, rich with plants from across the globe.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its elevated seaside perch, Villa Splendour enjoys incredible ocean and city views. With no expense spared, this ultra-luxurious five-bedroom is ideal for hosting family, friends, colleagues, and loved ones on vacation, or for a special event. Splendour’s five-car garage, elevator, and extremely spacious lounge areas were made to entertain, and they do so in the most stylish fashion. Nearby, you’ll find the downtown areas of Clifton and Cape Town, as well as the gorgeous beachfront areas of each city, Clifton Beach being the closest at just one kilometer.Splendour’s monochromatic decor is the perfect contrast to the vibrant greens and blues of Clifton’s gorgeous natural environment. Designed with clean, straight lines and modern-contemporary ideals, this villa takes beach vacation luxury to new heights. Custom designer furniture, high-end electronics, and eclectic works of art are thoughtfully placed throughout spacious common areas. And, the living room fully opens to the terrace, inviting fresh air and sunlight to flow freely through the entire villa.When it’s time for dinner, Splendour has beautiful settings inside and on the terrace. There’s also a bar inside, and an included chef service to help make sure you’ve got lots of time to enjoy your night, rather than working away in the kitchen. Inevitably, the party will spill out on to the ocean-view terrace where you’ll find the infinity swimming pool, alfresco showers, sun loungers, and outdoor living areas. Back inside, Splendour is equipped with television, a gas fireplace, an office, and Wi-Fi.Nearby beaches, Clifton and Camps Bay, are both conveniently close to Splendour, and both feature pristine white sand, calm waters, and vibrant beach town surroundings. You won’t have any trouble finding a local restaurant for dinner or cocktails; there are plenty lining the street just before the beaches. Clifton and Cape Town are also both great for tourist excursions, with activities like guided hikes through the heights of the Table Mountains to deep sea diving. And, there’s a wide range of shopping nearby as well.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel like royalty at the opulent Sab Palace. Set on nearly five acres of private grounds in La Palmeraie, this Marrakech vacation rental feels like a world of luxury unto itself, with extensive amenities, gorgeous architecture and decor, and twenty bedrooms. Reserve the property for a family reunion, to celebrate a milestone birthday or anniversary with friends, or host a destination wedding—and the honeymoon afterwards.The grounds of the palace are studded with five swimming pools, from an expansive main pool to a lap pool, as well as plenty of loungers. A tennis court, exercise room, home theater, games area and a private spa make the property feel like your very own resort. To add to that feeling, daily breakfast is included in your stay.Like many a historic palace, this one is a striking combination of the traditional and modern, with classic rugs and artwork alongside clean-lined contemporary furnishings. Multiple sitting and dining areas mean there’s plenty of room to gather and enjoy each other’s company or to find a quiet nook where you can catch up on reading. Though breakfast is included in your holiday, there is a fully equipped kitchen.Sab Palace has eight senior suites with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and seven junior suites with en-suite bathrooms: six with king beds and one with two twin beds. Guest house Villa di Rosa has two bedrooms with king beds that share a bathroom, and Villa Blanche has one bedroom with a king bed and one with a queen bed, both with en-suite bathrooms. There are also deluxe bedrooms, with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and superior suites, with queen beds and shared bathrooms.While the villa is located in a quiet and stylish area of Marrakech, it’s a short drive from must-see sights such as the city’s bustling medina and the exquisite Jardin Majorelle. Avid players will appreciate that it’s also within easy reach of the Amelkis golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
